name: DeathChase (1983) Clone
description:
CONTROLS:

W / S --> Accelerate/Decelerate

A / D --> Rotate Left / Right

     (or arrow keys)

Spacebar -->  Shoot

P --> Pause

R --> Reset Game

Note: The bottom UI got a little distorted when building to WebGL

~

This is a clone of the original DeathChase (1983) for the ZX Spectrum.

Original Game: https://archive.org/details/zx_Deathchase_1983_Micromega
